news_header: Stora Enso will resume timely payments to suppliers.
news_text: Stora Enso has decided to stop delaying payments to its suppliers of goods and services. According to Dagens Industri, the company had previously planned its cash flow by pushing payments from September to October. Stora Enso confirmed this decision and stated that the payments have now been made. CEO Hans Sohlström has apologized for any potential consequences arising from the company's earlier operations.
